abstract.t: The Point-to-Point Protocol (PPP) provides a standard method for transporting multi-protocol datagrams over point-to-point links.
The PPP Compression Control Protocol provides a method to negotiate and utilize compression protocols over PPP encapsulated links.
This document describes the use of the Microsoft Point to Point Compression protocol (also referred to as MPPC in this document) for compressing PPP encapsulated packets.
